plot: Climate Change is having a drastic effect on the Vuntut Gwitchin First Nation's traditional livelihoods; this film takes you on a journey from nearly 20 years ago to the present, with a community whose very survival is at risk.
title: Our Changing Homelands Our Changing Lives
plot_es: Climate Change is having a drastic effect on the Vuntut Gwitchin First Nation's traditional livelihoods; this film takes you on a journey from nearly 20 years ago to the present, with a community whose very survival is at risk.
original_name: Our Changing Homelands Our Changing Lives
